qas.question: What languages besides Portuguese are taught in Brasilia's schools?
How many international schools are in Brasilia?
When will a new international school open in Brasilia?
What nationality will the new international school in Brasilia be?
Where is English the primary language taught in Brasilia?
How many private colleges are in Brasilia?
In what year will the official curriculum start?
What school will the official curriculum be taught in?
What is the Maple Bear Canadian School's official language?

context: The <a0_0><b9_0>Portuguese<b9_0/><a0_0/> language is the official national language and the primary language taught <b5_0>in schools<b5_0/>. <a1_0>English and Spanish<a1_0/> are also part of the official curriculum. The city has <a2_0><b6_0>six<b6_0/><a2_0/> international schools: American School of Brasília, Brasília International School (BIS), Escola das Nações, Swiss International School (SIS), Lycée français François-Mitterrand (LfFM) and Maple Bear Canadian School. <a3_0><b7_0>August 2016<b7_0/><a3_0/> will see the opening of a new international school - <b8_0>The <a4_0>British<a4_0/> School of Brasilia<b8_0/>. Brasília has two universities, three university centers, and many private colleges.
